TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

Docs.summary: Fornece dados para o evento de .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Lidar com o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextDisposing> evento e defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs> do objeto para `true`. Isso impede que o descarte do <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext>. Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerenciamento de ciclo de vida do objeto de contexto (EntityDataSource)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160).
## Examples Este exemplo mantém o <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> para referência futura manipulando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSource.ContextCreated> eventos.
``` protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; }
```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As ObjectContext
public: property System::Data::Objects::ObjectContext ^ Context { System::Data::Objects::ObjectContext ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Obtém o usado pela fonte de dados.
